mapper.select: select distinct r.id as roomId, g.name as groupName, g.avatar as avatar, g.id as groupId, g.account, g.allow_scan_enter, r.update_time from im_room_group g inner join im_room r on g.room_id = r.id inner join im_group_member m on g.id = m.group_id and m.is_del = 0 where m.uid = #{uid} and g.is_del = 0 order by r.update_time, g.id

select distinct r.id as roomId, g.name as groupName, g.avatar as avatar, g.id as groupId, g.account, g.allow_scan_enter, r.update_time from im_room_group g inner join im_room r on g.room_id = r.id where g.is_del = 0 order by r.update_time desc, g.id
